name: Use Case Developer Pack
description:
Configuration Items:

Frequency of task - How often is the task performed each week
Length of task - How long does the task take to complete in minutes
UseCaseConfig list - Sets the parameters for multiple automations and playbooks
Current Blended Rate list - Hourly rate used in calculations
UseCaseReview list - Determines when the use case should be reviewed for relevance

Playbook inputs:
ExternalTicketId - If this value is blank, this part of the playbook will be skipped. Logic will need to be defined according to your system configuration.


Main Books
Use Case - Evaluation
Initial workflow for evaluating automation requests. This is a basic evaluation using the submitted data from the customer.


Use Case - Customer Consult
Engage with customer to map out process and create a list deliverables.


Use Case - Process Development
Collection of playbooks to assist with development of use cases


Use Case - User Acceptance Testing
External testing phase. In this phase, the customer should be testing all functionality to ensure the use case meets their requirements.


Use Case - Process Reporting
Workflow to guide meeting with customer to develop any reporting requirements. 


Use Case - Deployment
Workflow to check and ensure all components have been migrated to production.


Use Case - Verification
Workflow to track verification and sign off  of use case in production


Sub Books
Use Case - S - Build Base
Create tasks for the basic building blocks of use case creation.

Use Case - S - Develop Integrations
Create development/creation tasks for all required integrations.

Use Case - S - Internal Testing
Provides basic time for testing



Sample config file:

{
	"Evaluation": {
		"steps": {
			"Review Customer Submission": 2,
			"Determine Feasibility": 4
		},
		"days": 7,
		"playbook": "Use Case - Evaluation",

	},
	"Customer Consult": {

	"Development": {
